description: A US one-cent coin, featuring a portrait of Abraham Lincoln.  You could flip it.

The official US silver bullion coin of the United States, it has a nominal face value of one dollar and is guaranteed to contain one troy ounce of 99.9% pure silver.
The official US 24-karat bullion coin of the United States, it has a nominal face value of fifty dollars and is guaranteed to contain one troy ounce of 99.99% pure gold.
